name: Kickers Fanradio Flipper
description:
The ultimate pinball game for fans of the german hobbyists sports broadcaster "Fanradio Kickers TV" , the oldest active German Football fan driven web radio in service  (Football meaning Soccer for US-readers). This cult  web station has been broadcasting the games of the cult football club "OFC Kickers Offenbach" since 2006.

This game is an hommage to their service. You will hear the wise cracking comments of Lars Kissner and Lutz Kammermeier while you shoot the ball up ramps and rollovers in order to collect TV-revenue for the club.  Please note: naturally, this game is only available in German language.
